functions.tag: {tmw:{id:601,type:5003},display:{Name:'{"text":"偽塊の囁き","color":"red","italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"ミミックの研究で生み出されたイヤーカフ","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"訓練用というタグが付いている","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"装備時、ミミックの技の派生が可視化","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"---------- Inventory ----------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  ■□□□□□□□□  指定のスロットに入れると","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  効果が発動するタイプの","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  装飾品です","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"------------------------------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]']}}
